content: http://build.fhir.org/workflow-ad-hoc.html leaves "Usage examples" either blank or filled with "???". Is there a plan to close this gap (or add explicit TODOs, or better yet a link to an external wiki page) before STU3 publication?

We've solicited examples from the community but none have been forthcoming. Feel free to create a tracker item and I'll see if I can get to it. (Or if you have the bandwidth, feel free to adjust as you see fit.)
Ok. Can I add a link to an empty wiki page without further ado?
